title: In Returns of Tua Tagovailoa and Brian Flores, Dolphins’ Troubles Are on Display
description: The N.F.L. has been bedeviled by its attempts to better evaluate players for concussions and to hire diverse head coaches. In the Dolphins’ win over the Steelers, those issues were on full display.
dc:creator: Emmanuel Morgan
media:description: Tua Tagovailoa threw for 261 yards and a touchdown in his first game back since sustaining a concussion on Sept. 29.
